page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: The Newton Abbot area is lucky in the different sorts of transport systems that it has in or near it.We are close to the{M5 motorway}to travel north and have a good road south to Plymouth. {National coach services}run through the town to all parts of the country. There is a main line{British Rail station in the town with services to all parts of the country. The nearest {airports}are Exeter and Plymouth with good services to foreign countries. Plymouth, 3O miles away has a{cross {channel service.}In Newton Abbot the traffic is a constant problem.Recently a new traffic system was introduced but most people think it has made traffic jams worse, not better and at peak times there are long queues of vehicles trying to get through the town and it makes people angry. On Summer Saturdays jams miles long form.
